shared_buffers.describe: Database memory for data blocks. Set to ~25% of RAM.

work_mem.describe: Memory for internal sort/hash operations before writing to disk.

maintenance_work_mem.describe: Memory used for maintenance tasks like VACUUM and index builds.

effective_cache_size.describe: Planner's estimate of the OS disk cache availability.

wal_buffers.describe: Memory for WAL data that has not yet been written to disk.

checkpoint_completion_target.describe: Fraction of checkpoint time for disk flush to finish.

checkpoint_timeout.describe: Maximum time between automatic WAL checkpoints.

effective_io_concurrency.describe: The number of simultaneous disk I/O operations.

join_collapse_limit.describe: Threshold for planner to flatten explicit JOIN clauses.

from_collapse_limit.describe: Threshold for planner to flatten sub-queries.

bgwriter_delay.describe: Delay between activity rounds for the background writer.

bgwriter_lru_multiplier.describe: Multiplier for the number of buffers to clean in one round.

default_statistics_target.describe: Determines the level of detail for database statistics.

max_parallel_workers_per_gather.describe: Max workers used for a single Parallel Gather node.
